name: Stuart ROSS, Appellant, v. PHILADELPHIA CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Ross v. Philadelphia Civil Service Commission

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Stuart ROSS, Appellant, v. PHILADELPHIA CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 1991, the Order of the Commonwealth Court, — Pa.Cmwlth. -, 556 A.2d 550, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, III, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John P. Straub, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
588 A.2d 503
Stuart ROSS, Appellant, v. PHILADELPHIA CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 5, 1990.
Decided March 25, 1991.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, III, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John P. Straub, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
